properties.value: Brian is a shop owner who runs Brian's Battleaxe Bazaar in Port Sarim. He sells battleaxes, from bronze to adamant. He also plays a small role in the One Small Favour quest, agreeing to sharpen the jungle forester's axe if his friend is returned to him.

This article is about the battleaxe merchant in Port Sarim. For other Brians, see Brian (disambiguation).

NPC ID2892

Brian is a shop owner who runs Brian's Battleaxe Bazaar in Port Sarim. He sells battleaxes, from bronze to adamant. He also plays a small role in the One Small Favour quest, agreeing to sharpen the jungle forester's axe if his friend is returned to him.

Contents

  • 1 Treasure Trails
  • 2 Stock
  • 3 Dialogue
  • 4 Changes
    • 4.1 Gallery (historical)

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

Brian is the solution to the beginner anagram clue: IN BAR.
